monogr.title: Drum Beats: Walt Whitman's Civil War Boy Lovers

bibl.author: S. H. Childs (for Caleb H. Babbitt)
bibl.title: S. H. Childs (for Caleb H. Babbitt) to Walt Whitman, 26 October 1863
bibl.orgName: Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature at the New York Public Library

body.p: Caleb Babbitt wishes me to write you a few lines to let you know where he is. as you will see by the heading of this letter that he is in a Hospital in Boston. he Is unable to set up & suffers considerable pain

In his head. you will probably see Mr Archibald & he will Inform you how he Is getting along. he wishes you to say something about Miss Clark to him If you write to Miss C her Address Is Barre, Mass. Babbitt wishes you to write to him.
